import react from"react";import{useLazyQuery,useQuery}from"@apollo/react-hooks";import{useUser}from"../context/userContext";import SecondCardBackground from"./images/second-card-background.gif";import CountUp from"react-countup";import"./styles/card2.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SecondCard=function SecondCard(props){var obj=props.contributionData;// Number of PRs the user has in the MLH-Organization repos
